showerReviews.reviewText: Was here a couple weeks ago. Lifeguards need retrained. Women‚Äôs bathroom reeks of mold. Splash pad is nice although seating is limited. Pay attention to pool hours, members only for the first hour. Staff is not the friendliest.

Clean water, lifeguards are attentive, comfortable lounge chairs, lots of grass, splash pad, lazy river, zero entry area & 2 huge slides. Vending machines & a different food truck each day, instead of a concession stand. Very worth the cost of a SU membership, or just pay the daily rate.

The area is always really clean and the lifeguards pay close attention. We're corporate residents  (Which is so nice!) And so prices aren't bad at all. My daughter LOVES the splash pad, and she always has fun running around. We used to come ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ love it and rate it 5 stars if it weren't for the pandemic. But a lot of the stuff is shut down or revamped for safety right now.  They take it very seriously, which is great! But honestly, I'd love to shower off the chlorine from the pool!

Nice clean, comfortable room and great bed. Overall the hotel is a bit dated, but clean and comfortable. The front desk was friendly and efficient, however service in the bar was mediocre. Well located and priced for our needs on this trip.

The rooms were fine - clean, odorless, etc. The biggest 2 surprises were proximity to airport (substabtial in the afternoon, though the noise virtually disappeared after 9 or 10) and the parking (we got double charged for the parking because there was an event happening at Rocket Arena). Otherwise, fine hotel.

This hotel was a complete letdown from start to finish. As we got close to the hotel, I called to see if we were able to check in early. It was around 2 PM and check in wasn‚Äôt until 3. The lady on the phone verified that my room was clean ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ wasn't that much geese residue if you know what I mean laying around. Everyone was having fun it wasn't real crowded and the water was great. The restrooms in the shower areas were very clean. I just wish there were a few more barbecue pits

Not well, I car camp traveling across the US. And was very disappointed with no water or access to shower.

Very relaxing the beach area was recently cleaned very quiet for summer. Playground for the kids is nice bathrooms an shower available. Snack machines an soda available. Nice for picnic or walk or just relaxing in the sun.

‚Ä¶ ! There are also food trucks in the summer if you didn't BBQ! Cool summer classic place in the Midwest! It's not Florida or pure Michigan! The water is dirty! They do have showers! My suggestion if you use the water use the shower!! üëå!! ‚Ä¶

The water is sweet, ppl are nice, to see all the families there having fun is a great experience. The park is amazingly fun for the kid's.  There's food trucks, ice cream truck nd bathrooms/shower.
Familyfuntime. Beachtime

Currently in the shower here. Whoever is cleaning the showers is blasting rap music containing sexual content, racial slurs, and other adult language. It's playing at an unbearable volume right outside my shower door. Just what I want at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ laid out. Had to move the truck during fueling as it couldn't be completed normally due to staggered position of pumps. Several fuel lanes closed and 5 people waiting in line for a shower at 11am on a Saturday. Definitely won't ever return!

Far too small. Shower has no shower wand. Dried poop in the toilet of our shower room. Mess splattered on the toilet paper dispenser from idk what not do I want to know at this point. Lot is FAR TOO SMALL. Save yourself from this place, TA ‚Ä¶

Overall it's clean inside but when taking a shower the attendant has the music so loud a person can't think. I like rap music at times but don't need it this  loud. I usually leave a tip because they work hard and are probably underpaid but ‚Ä¶

Reserved shower on the app, they gave away my shower I walked in 30 seconds after they gave me the code and they said it expired.
They don‚Äôt clean the showers after each use either

‚Ä¶ I nicely explained that my reserved shower disappeared after 5min & I white blonde skinny lady at the counter was rude to me saying it‚Äôs normal it‚Äôs gone after 5min!! Adding that I should be ready waiting here so why I am so surprised.. üò° ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The McDonald's was horrible. Stale bread. greasy meat and hard fries. Then I went to shower. Was assigned shower one. Floor was dirty and wet with hair still in the shower. Asked for it to be cleaned and watched the mediocre job he did at ‚Ä¶
I want to thank the cashier, Kat, for her patience and perseverance, she put all her effort and knowledge into finding my shower points. I am extremely grateful to her for her help! Thank you

I bought a shower at that location and weighted 4 an hour and the employee was taking a lunch break for 30 minutes and people wanna take a shower anyways, so they can relax. Take a break from driving.
Customers always comes first

‚Ä¶ this is the perfect spot to spend the night. The parking lot is huge and everybody  place was great I've always loved truck stops of America there's a shower amenity is awesome and the stories well cap with plenty of items to choose from.

The staff was friendly, the place is clean and the shower felt wonderful. It has a Taco Bell inside and they did a wonderful job with our food. There is also lots of parking for overnight trucks.

I am waiting for the shower 1our .just leave 2min is missing. I want to change new ticket...She says NO.what hell!
